availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Chandler (Lebanon, Marion County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Lebanon, Marion County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth C. Bevin Chandler. Father of Benjamin R. Chandler, Lewis M. Chandler, Elizabeth L. Chandler, Ann J. Chandler, John E. Chandler, Fannie Chandler, Edward Chandler, Nannie Chandler. Merchant in Marion County in 1850. Employed J. R. Knott, Albert J. Jenkins in 1850. Merchant in Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, p. 679.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon, p. 107.
